channel.title: Rune-Loft v2
channel.description:
Hello all
Well me and yorick have been making a new server :o and i have just came here to post are progress so far on the server :)
Features Full Mining Full Woodcutting Full fletching (with interfaces and stringing) Full npc + stall theving :) (resparwn like real rs on stalls) Full tree farming RegionHandler (to tell were about the player is i.e fally bank w/e) Bankhandler Working combat premiumHandler (when premium memebers log in they sparwn a lil kitten beside them what just followa him not attacking nothink) Doorhandler NPCAnimations (can control the npcs deaths and attack modes ;) )
Bounus :o Client.java size is 38kb!! (thats preety gd for nearly 4 fullie working skills and combat ;) ) Picture of java files [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/3178/89785110an5.png[/img] running menu [code]rune-loft has started PremiumHandler version 1.9 initialized! -- Updates.java loaded -- -- FletchingHandler Loaded -- -- DoorHandler.java loaded -- -- WorldObjectHandler loaded -- -- BankHandler loaded -- -- Thieving.java loaded -- [/code]
Server images [img]http://img140.imageshack.us/img140/5963/60924468tu5.png[/img] [img]http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/3536/85772643tj0.png[/img] [img]http://img258.imageshack.us/img258/8167/88718174cg2.png[/img] [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/6195/93018902pp0.png[/img] [img]http://img77.imageshack.us/img77/5201/49267658sp8.png[/img]

item.title: Rune-Loft v2
item.dc:creator: @t_x T x
item.description:
@t_x wrote:

Hello all

Well me and yorick have been making a new server :o and i have just came here to post are progress so far on the server

Features
Full Mining
Full Woodcutting
Full fletching (with interfaces and stringing)
Full npc + stall theving (resparwn like real rs on stalls)
Full tree farming
RegionHandler (to tell were about the player is i.e fally bank w/e)
Bankhandler
Working combat
premiumHandler (when premium memebers log in they sparwn a lil kitten beside them what just followa him not attacking nothink)
Doorhandler
NPCAnimations (can control the npcs deaths and attack modes )

Bounus :o
Client.java size is 38kb!! (thats preety gd for nearly 4 fullie working skills and combat )
Picture of java files

running menu

rune-loft has started PremiumHandler version 1.9 initialized! -- Updates.java loaded -- -- FletchingHandler Loaded -- -- DoorHandler.java loaded -- -- WorldObjectHandler loaded -- -- BankHandler loaded -- -- Thieving.java loaded --
